mutants.code:
def transform_string(s: str) -> str:
    translation_map = str.maketrans('', 'vkbaafpqistuvwnyzabtpvfghi')
    transformed_string = s.translate(translation_map)
    return transformed_string

def transform_string(s: str) -> str:
    translation_map = str.maketrans('abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz', '')
    transformed_string = s.translate(translation_map)
    return transformed_string
